nodes.text: Galboron was a planet located in the Hertae sector of the Mid Rim.

In 18 BBY, Galboron was the location of the major battle of the Noolian Crisis. Imperial Captain Par Lankin defeated the Aqualish and Harch forces of the Separatist holdouts. In later years, the victory would be one of many that a player could simulate on Plescinia Entertainments' CS-Mark 10 Imperial Command Combat Simulator.

Galboron was mentioned in the cancelled Dirty Dozen: The Imperial Grand Admirals article slated to appear in Star Wars Gamer 13 as the site of a battle between the Galactic Empire and the Alliance to Restore the Republic eventually winning out by Grand Admiral Octavian Grant.
